channel.title: GAE on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in GAE on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] I'm in Singapore right now, a story about creating a LineBot and wanting to do a memorable job
item.description: # "Sorry, don't go to class" This CM with a strong impact. I love this, so if you invite me to a class “I’m in Singapore now” I have made a LineBot that will reply to me. In addition, various specifications that further enhance the feeling of ** Even if it doesn’t remain on the map, I want to make it a memorable job of the person who used it!
